infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of animals in distress.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select photos of animals.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to match you with nearby volunteers and animals in need.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs your location to notify you of nearby animal emergencies even when the app is closed.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Animal Rescue to access your camera to take photos of animals in distress.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Animal Rescue to use your location to match you with nearby volunteers and animals in need.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Animal Rescue to use your location to notify you of nearby animal emergencies.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Animal Rescue to use your location to match you with nearby volunteers and animals in need.
